law.text: Upon the granting of an order confirming, modifying or correcting, an award, judgment or decree shall be entered in conformity therewith and be enforced as any other judgment or decree. Costs of the application and of the proceedings subsequent thereto, and disbursements may be awarded by the court.
law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 278, sec. 14, effective July 13, 1984.
